intro: Humorous point-and-click adventure game from the Middle Ages. Go through the castle and solve all the puzzles.
description:
King Jister 3 is a free sequel to the adventure games about a quest to rescue Princess Ariabel from the clutches of King Jister. The game has full English voiceover and contains light black humour and can be played on its own without knowledge of the previous episodes. 

Immerse yourself in the medieval kingdom of King Jister and solve the classic point and click adventure plot and puzzles.

Designed for fans of classic adventure games.

FEATURES

Explore numerous locations, solve logic puzzles and interact with characters to get through the story. With a multitude of items at your disposal, use your wits and cleverness to navigate the castle's catacombs and uncover its many secrets.

- A fully standalone point and click adventure game
- Classic first-person point-and-click gameplay
- 36 detailed locations to explore
- Several characters
- Many items to explore
- Puzzles to solve
- Hand-drawn 3D-style graphics
- Full English voiceover
- English, Czech and Japanese subtitles
- Automatic location saving
- Playable in handheld, tabletop, or TV mode

STORY

One fine day (according to the hourglass, the year is 1328), unknown messengers of King Jister kidnapped your sweetheart. You were in a very unusable state, so you could not defend her. Once the messengers have left, our game story begins. The goal is to avenge and rescue Ariabel from the clutches of King Jister.

In the first episode it was necessary to find the castle of King Jister, in the second episode the adventure continued by breaking into the castle and searching for more clues to find Ariabel. Our story starts on the next floor of the castle, so good luck!
